definitions.definition: Anxiety over the uncertain future or possible ill - occurrence .
examples: I decided, with considerable trepidation , to let him drive my car without me.

definitions.definition: An involuntary trembling, sometimes an effect of paralysis , but usually caused by terror or fear.
A libration of the starry sphere in the Ptolemaic system ; a motion ascribed to the firmament , to account for certain small changes in the position of the ecliptic and of the stars .

main_definition: Anxiety over the uncertain future or possible ill - occurrence .
secondary_definitions: An involuntary trembling, sometimes an effect of paralysis , but usually caused by terror or fear.

( astronomy , obsolete ) A libration of the starry sphere in the Ptolemaic system ; a motion ascribed to the firmament , to account for certain small changes in the position of the ecliptic and of the stars .
